resources.string: The disappearance of two children shows the links between four families and exposes the past of a small city
After a young woman takes her life, her classmate finds a mysterious box in her yard

Convicted of a decade old crime of transporting drug money to an ex-girlfriend, normally law-abiding Piper Chapman is sentenced to a year and a half behind bars to face the reality of how life-changing prison can really be
Some children begin to notice strange behaviors in the place where they live where they have to find a solution to a big problem
Some thieves infiltrate a bank which they try to steal in a very clever way, they can execute what they plan
This series shows the competition between noble families of seven kingdoms of Westeros, whose purpose is to gain control over the Iron Throne
Las Encinas is the most exclusive school in Spain, the place where the children of the elite study and where they have just been admitted three young low class, from a public school in ruins
This series tells the story of Patty, an overweight teenager who suffers the teasing of her classmates, until she loses weight during a summer vacation

After being in a coma, police Rick Grimes discovers that a disease led to a zombie apocalypse. Rick will lead a group of survivors to find a safe place, but the most dangerous fights will arise among themselves
A chronicle of the life of Queen Elizabeth II from the 40s to modern times. As the decades pass, personal intrigues, romances and political rivalries are revealed
